description: The component analysis is being refined to address the feedback regarding the `Orchestration Engine` and missing destination components. The `Orchestration Engine`'s role is central to the documentation generation pipeline, and its implementation details are crucial for accurate representation.

components.name: Orchestration Engine
components.description: The central component responsible for managing the documentation generation pipeline, including job status and delegating the core generation process to other pipeline stages.

components.name: Job Database
components.description: Manages the persistence and status of documentation generation jobs.

components.name: External Interfaces
components.description: Provides API endpoints for interacting with the documentation generation system.

components.name: Repository Manager
components.description: Manages access and retrieval of code repositories for analysis within the documentation generation pipeline.

components.name: Static Analysis Engine
components.description: Performs static code analysis to extract structural and semantic information from source code.

components.name: AI Interpretation Layer
components.description: Interprets analysis results and generates insights using AI models for documentation content.

components.name: Diagram Generation Service
components.description: Generates visual diagrams based on the interpreted code structure and relationships.

components.name: Output Generation Engine
components.description: Formats and produces the final documentation output in various formats.

components.name: Unclassified
components.description: Component for all unclassified files and utility functions (Utility functions/External Libraries/Dependencies)
